sect1.title: pre-installation configuration
sect1.para: Set an Environment variable to resolve the prefix destination.
If Gnome is your desktop of choice: export GNOME_PREFIX=/usr If you want to try-out Gnome: export GNOME_PREFIX=/opt/gnome-&gnome-version;
The try-out group will also need to make all the following configuration changes:
Add to your system or personal profile:

para.screen:
cat >> /etc/ld.so.conf << "EOF" # Begin gnome addition to /etc/ld.so.conf
/opt/gnome-&gnome-version;/lib
# End gnome addition EOF

cat >> /etc/man.conf << "EOF" # Begin gnome addition to man.conf
MANPATH /opt/gnome-&gnome-version;/man
# END gnome addition to man.conf EOF
